com.simsilica.lemur.style

Class StyleLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.style.StyleLoader

  • public class StyleLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses Groovy to load style definitions using a Groovy-based styles DSL. For this loader to operate, the groovy-all jar must be on the classpath.
